relation.text: had reached my Domicile without any strange Adventures . And , it is not above three days ago
slept at Welford on the Monday Night
Thursday ; drunk Tea there , with Mrs- George Clavering , & then went
started from thence at Six O'Clock in the Morning of Friday
did not look for me sooner , than dinner Time on Saturday
had taken a prize . A few days
now do , as quickly as poſsible . Your Congratulations to Lady Cathcart will not be delivered
